title: If you're under 25 years old, don't read or post here.
body:
I want to talk to some of the more mature players, I'm tired of all these young kid know-it-alls hitting me up on the forums thinking what they are saying is a valid argument counter to some ideas or concerns I have for league of legends. 

So, for those of you out there that are a bit older now, and don't want to deal with toxic kids ffing, and flaming your team, whats your best strategy for ranking up, and where do I find more older players that take the game seriously? 

Also, I'd like to know how you even found out about league in the first place, this really interests me.
